website_summaries.verdict: Increases your healthy fat intake and works well with a variety of diets.
pros: Has 6 grams of healthy fat per serving from 100% organic coconuts
Ideal for those on a paleo, ketogenic, vegan, low-carb, or intermittent fasting diet
Manufactured in the USA and FDA-approved

customer_reviews.title: Grit-free MCT Oil Powder, creamy and easy
customer_reviews.text: This is the best MCT oil product I have used. It has no grit, no residue, no real flavor. It blends beautifully with coffee and tea. I love it, it can be blended hot or cold and doesn't require a blender or any thing but makes an awesome foam if you do that makes the beverage feel fancy. It also mixes great in cold beverages with no residue. It makes it look creamy but doesn't add much to it. It's also easy to digest.
customer_reviews.author: Kerniec

customer_reviews.title: love the product, hate the waste
customer_reviews.text: This is the best MCT oil powder we've tried. It dissolves almost immediately in my morning coffee. No aftertaste, no clumping. Makes for a creamy cup of joe! BUT the container was a little more than half full upon arrival. I understand about settling but this is a powder that shouldn't have this issue. It's such a waste of plastic - something we don't need. Put it in a smaller container or add more product, please! Great product, poor packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Phee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try another brand of MCT powder. I was curious about unflavored powder. I am impressed there is not flavor, truly. No aftertaste either. This is so satisfying to watch "melt" into my hot coffee in the morning. It completely dissolves and it not gritty. Very easy add.
customer_reviews.author: Bluedevil01

customer_reviews.title: Best Keto MCT oil product ever...
customer_reviews.text: I have been on a Keto lifestyle and lost over 90 lbs total for almost two years and have tried SO many MCT products. This MCT oil powder is hands down the BEST- dissolves instantly, flavorless.. yet curbs appetite and all the amazing health benefits of MCT oil for the Ketogenic lifestyle! I start my day with this in my coffee along with heavy whipping cream for the BEST most satisfying cup of Keto coffee on the planet. Also great in reading, soups and even cold drinks. A MUST have Keto folks!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Demos-Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent... smooth and gentle on stomach
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Intentionally Bare products and the new MCT powder is great. The taste is creamy and mild, not overpowering and no aftertaste. MCT oil always upsets my stomach but this one didn’t at ALL. I use it in my coffee and in baking. It adds a wonderful consistency to baked Keto treats.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Elisa Chavez-Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price
customer_reviews.text: I liked the consistency of the powder and that it mixes so well into my coffee. I prefer unsweetened coffee and this MCT powder isn’t one of those that covers the taste of a good cup of coffee. The cost was also a factor...most out there are more expensive and they give you less for the money. All things considered, I’ll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel V.

customer_reviews.title: Best MCT Oil Powder Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have used 6-8 different MCT Oil Powders since starting KETO in 2018. I was happy with several of the different brands but decided to give this one a shot. I can honestly say that this is the ABSOLUTE best MCT Oil Powder that I have tried. One scoop in my coffee gives it a lovely creamy look and taste. There is ABSOLUTELY no grit, not even at the bottom of the cup and not around the sides when my cup is empty. It dissolves completely. I have shoved my other brands to the top of the pantry to be used for cooking. I have 2 words for anyone on the fence - BUY IT !!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: The way it tastes and dissolves
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased other MCT products. This is the best there is on the market. Dissolves well. Doesn’t sink to the bottom of the cup and no grit. I have 5 canisters and plan to purchase more of the Intentionally Naked/Bare products.
customer_reviews.author: Robin E. Macanas

customer_reviews.title: Non gritty, super easy mixing, creamy!
customer_reviews.text: Mixes so super easy with just a spoon. No other mct oil powder can compare. I have tried a few other powders. This is non gritty super easy mixing even my super picky 8 yo loves it in her hot cocoa. Makes a perfect non dairy creamer. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: bethany

customer_reviews.title: Dissolves great! Smooth taste! Jar wasn't even half full!
customer_reviews.text: The taste is great! This is the second time I've ordered this MCT oil powder and I do like how easy it dissolves and the nice smooth taste! I use it in my green and black tea, it makes it creamy and has a nice taste. No aftertaste. But this time the jar was just a whole lot of air!! Why waste so much space! Why not just fill it or use a smaller container?
customer_reviews.author: april murrell

product_meta.title: Organic Coconut MCT Oil Powder - Zero Net Carbs - Keto Diet, Paleo, Vegan - Sustained Energy, Appetite Control, Mental Clarity - Great for Keto Coffee & Shakes - Non-GMO - Unflavored, 50 Servings
product_meta.description:
Do you want to increase your energy levels and mental performance while supporting your weight loss goals? Intentionally Naked MCT oil powder is your convenient, effective solution!



MCTs (medium chain triglycerides) can help you get and stay in ketosis!

With your body in ketosis, you will:



 * Burn MCTs (medium chain triglycerides) as fuel instead storing them as fat



 * Enjoy increased energy levels



 * Have improved mental clarity, focus, and concentration



 * Experience fewer hunger pangs



Your body starts burning MCTs as fuel almost immediately. Taken in the morning, MCTs provide long-term, stable energy, helping you stay focused longer. Plus, you’ll avoid the crash that comes with caffeine. Since your body would rather burn ketones than glycogen, MCTs are a high-quality fuel source for your brain and your body.



Explore the benefits of MCTs for yourself!

 * Supports intermittent fasting
 * Stabilizes blood sugars
 * Provides fast, clean energy to ease your body into ketosis more quickly and easily
 * Easy to absorb
 * Speeds your metabolism to aid in weight/fat loss
 * Improves energy and mood
 * Aids in digestion



For the clean-burning energy and increased mental performance you’ve been looking for, buy Intentionally Naked MCT oil FatStack powder today! For the best results, use in combination with our ProteinStack and EnergyStack supplements.
feature_bullets: HEALTHY FATS for EVERY DIET - Do you want a convenient way to increase your intake of healthy fats? Just one scoop of Intentionally Naked MCT Oil Powder provides you with 7 g of healthy fat, 0 g net carbs, and 0 g of sugar. It’s an easy way to get into ketosis and stay there-perfect for the paleo, keto, vegan, low-carb, or intermittent fasting diet. Even if you’re not on a diet, wouldn’t you still like a natural, appetite-suppressing fat that boosts your energy and mood?

POWER INTO YOUR DAY - Do you want the highest quality fuel for your brain and body? Add a scoop of powdered MCT oil to your hot or cold drink in the morning to keep you feeling full for hours and enjoying sustained energy, improved mood, and a faster metabolism. No fuss, no mess, just the fuel you need to keep you powered for hours!

CONVENIENT for a BUSY LIFESTYLE - Are you tired of the mess, digestive distress, and inconvenience of liquid MCTs? Powdered MCT oil is convenient to use and is easier to take along to the office or when traveling. It adds a smooth, creamy texture to hot or cold drinks. Or you can add it to shakes, coffee, smoothies, dressings, sauces, baking, or other recipes. There’s no end to the tasty ways you can enjoy MCT oil powder!

QUALITY FUEL for QUALITY PERFORMANCE - Do you get lost or confused reading ingredient lists? Intentionally Naked products have nothing to hide. Our pure MCT oil powder (35% C8 and 23.8% C10) is made from organic coconuts and contains no fillers or additives and is free of maltodextrin. It’s manufactured in the USA at an FDA-regulated facility. Our MCT oil powder provides you with just what you need and nothing more so you can be confident you’re giving your body the best fuel.

NO RISK GUARANTEE - At Intentionally Naked, we believe in total transparency and stand behind our products no matter what. We’re so confident that you’ll be thrilled with results of our MCT powder that we’ve backed it with a 100% hassle free return policy. Just contact us directly, and we’ll do everything we can to ensure your complete satisfaction. No risk. No drama. Just happy customers.
